statements: SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT log_message FROM device_logs WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE error_code = 500 AND log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE error_code = 404 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 12345 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, log_message, error_code FROM device_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY device_id ASC, log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(id) AS log_count FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 10 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(error_code) AS avg_error_code FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_error_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM error_messages WHERE error_timestamp <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-12-01';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, device_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE log_id > 10 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_message FROM error_messages WHERE error_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND error_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING log_count > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT dl.log_id, dl.device_id, em.error_message FROM device_logs dl INNER JOIN error_messages em ON dl.log_id = em.log_id;
SELECT * FROM device_logs
SELECT log_message FROM device_logs
SELECT * FROM error_messages WHERE error_id = 1
SELECT error_message FROM error_messages WHERE error_id = 2
SELECT log_description FROM maintenance_logs
SELECT * FROM device_logs
SELECT log_message FROM device_logs WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, log_message FROM device_logs ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT error_message FROM error_messages WHERE error_id = 10
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_description LIKE '%maintenance%'
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT device_id, log_message, timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM error_messages ORDER BY error_code DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_details WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT error_code, error_description FROM error_messages WHERE error_code BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM device_logs JOIN device_details ON device_logs.device_id = device_details.device_id;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_details WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type='phone'
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message FROM user_logs
SELECT * FROM error_messages INNER JOIN device_logs ON error_messages.log_id = device_logs.log_id
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT devices.device_name, devices.device_type, device_logs.log_timestamp FROM devices INNER JOIN device_logs ON devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT users.username, user_logs.log_timestamp, user_logs.log_message FROM users INNER JOIN user_logs ON users.user_id = user_logs.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT error_messages.error_id, error_messages.error_message, device_logs.log_timestamp FROM error_messages INNER JOIN device_logs ON error_messages.log_id = device_logs.log_id ORDER BY error_messages.error_timestamp DESC;
